original_title: ComBank & Green Building Council in landmark agreement to promote sustainable construction
original_body_lines: The Commercial Bank of Ceylon has entered into a landmark cooperation agreement with the Green Building Council of Sri Lanka, laying the framework for the two institutions to work together to promote eco-friendly building construction in Sri Lanka.

A Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) commits the Bank and the Council to cooperate in activities related to the introduction of sustainable financing products by the Bank to facilitate the transition to carbon-neutral and environmentally-sustainable economic developments.
